description: This file defines functions for emitting C++ code related to JSON-RPC event and method registration, deregistration, and serialization. It includes mechanisms for generating method prototypes, handling parameters and responses, and managing event listeners within a JSONRPC framework.
external_methods: # symbolized by the imported json_loader module's contents

classes.name: AppendTest
classes.description: A class or function used for appending test conditions in JSON parameter validation, imported from class_emitter.

methods.name: EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for emitting a specific JSON-RPC event, including the method prototype, parameter handling, and notification logic.

methods.name: _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])
methods.description: Outputs the initial part of the RPC C++ file, including includes, namespace declarations, and version code.

methods.name: _EmitRpcEpilogue(root, emit, ns)
methods.description: Outputs closing namespace brackets for the RPC C++ code.

methods.name: _EmitVersionCode(emit, version)
methods.description: Generates C++ code for defining version constants.

methods.name: _EmitRpcCode(root, emit, ns, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates the bulk of the C++ RPC registration code, including method registration and event registration.

methods.name: EmitRpcCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Top-level function that generates the full RPC C++ code including prologue, main code, and epilogue.

methods.name: EmitRpcVersionCode(root, emit, header_file, source_file, data_emitted)
methods.description: Generates version-specific parts of the C++ RPC code.

methods.name: _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")

ctags.name: EmitEvent
ctags.pattern: /^def EmitEvent(emit, root, event, params_type, legacy = False):$/

ctags.name: _EmitRpcPrologue
ctags.pattern: /^def _EmitRpcPrologue(root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = []):$/
ctags.signature: (root, emit, header_file, source_file, ns, data_emitted, prototypes = [])

ctags.name: _Invoke
ctags.pattern: /^            def _Invoke(params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", re/
ctags.signature: (params, response, use_prefix = True, const_cast = False, parent = "", repsonse_parent = "")
